name: Blob Torture
description:
Made for Gdevelop Game Jam #3

For better experience: Play my game on Liluo

How to play:

There's 2 Stats Bar on left side of the game.

The lighter one is Toughness and the darker one is Sanity

Your goal is to break your Suspect and Witness Toughness to Zero and Make Them talk.

Drag and drop the torture kit to the Suspect or Witness.

The Sanity bars is the same as Health in other game. If it drop to zero They will- try not to find out.

This game consist of 5 level.

Each Suspect or Witness has its own Weakness. Find their weakness in order to save the world.

Issue Founded:

None
